name: par-cypress-automation-tests

scripts.cypress:open: npx cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=test npx cypress open
scripts.cypress:run: npm run clean:reports && npx cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=local npx cypress run
scripts.cypress:run:tags: npm run clean:reports && npx cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=test npx cypress run --env tags=@ui
scripts.cypress:run:local:tags: npm run clean:reports && npx cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=test npx cypress run --env tags=@ui
scripts.cypress:run:env: npm run clean:reports && npx cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=stage npx cypress run
scripts.cypress:run:report: npm run cypress:run && npm run report:merge
scripts.cypress:run:tags:report: npm run cypress:run:tags && npm run report:merge
scripts.cypress:run:env:report: npm run cypress:run:env && npm run report:merge
scripts.cypress:run:local:a11y: npm run clean:reports && npx cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=test npx cypress run --env tags=@accessibility
scripts.win:cypress:open: npx cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=local npx cypress open

author: Timothy.ajisafe@timztos.co.uk
description: Cypress - Primary Authority Register (PAR) Automation Test
